channel.title: Skillcape ffs no1 ever helps me?
channel.description: can any1 tell me so u can make it wen u get 99 of a certain skill it gives u a skillcape for that skill? Also, how do i make it so if sum1 doesn't ahve 99 atk they cannot wear the atk skillcape for silabs client

item.title: Skillcape ffs no1 ever helps me?
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Hes asking for when you LEVEL up to 99 it auto gives you skill cape

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) { addItem(Skillcapeidhere, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just recived the Attack skill cape!"); }

enjoy.
-tyrael-

Read full topic
item.source: Skillcape ffs no1 ever helps me?

item.title: Skillcape ffs no1 ever helps me?
item.dc:creator: @nick6554 nick6554
item.description:
@nick6554 wrote:

ok at the very bottom of your client.java u should see somthing like this:

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

yeah CTRL-F that (search)

add this under it

if (ItemID == 14074) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 14073) { return 99; }

that sould make the 99 stat req. for both capes…

if it doesnt… my Ids must be wrong… simply swith 14074 and 14073 for the attack cape and the attack cape(t)'s resperctive Ids

(I am pretty sure that those r the IDs tho )

Hope this helps
